Max age - 

Midstorey species - proportion of biomass
`lbm_prop`

```{r}
var_set %>%
  filter(cscnid == "TH00_rcp45_PB_01_ACCESS1-0") %>%
  pull(all_vars) %>%
  .[[1]] %>%
  lxtract("lbm_prop") %>%
  .[[c(1, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50)]] %>%
  lp(
    zlim = c(0, 1),
    names.attr = c(2019, 2029, 2039, 2049, 2059, 2069) %>% as.character
  )
  
```
